roleset.name: admit

role.descr: secondary predication, attribute of arg 1 acknowledged

example.name: acknowledge-v: a sentence
example.text: Control Data 's semiconductor business , VTC Inc. , continues to lose money , the executives acknowledged , but they said they consider some of the technology vital to national defense and so are reluctant to dispose of it .

propbank.arg: Control Data 's semiconductor business , VTC Inc. , continues to lose money

example.name: acknowledge-v: an NP
example.text: Apparently acknowledging weaker U.S. sales systemwide , McDonald's vowed `` to use our size and muscle to do all that is necessary to build the brand . ''

example.name: ARG2
example.text: During a phone call with him on Thursday , I acknowledged to him that I had changed my mind , " De Carolis said .

propbank.arg: During a phone call with him on Thursday
that I had changed my mind , "

example.name: ARG3
example.text: the British Government has acknowledged it as a learning disability .

example.name: acknowledgment-n: NP only, args 0, 1
example.text: the U.S. government 's first acknowledgment of what other groups , such as the International Monetary Fund , have been predicting for months

propbank.arg: of what other groups , such as the International Monetary Fund , have been predicting for months

example.name: acknowledgment-n: Arg1 for
example.text: The sales team was sent on a week - long cruise in acknowledgment for their outstanding performance this quarter .

propbank.arg: for their outstanding performance this quarter

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: While acknowledging the necessity of drafting emergency response plans , academics argue that an even more pressing task facing the government is to catalog Taiwan 's marine resources .

propbank.arg: the necessity of drafting emergency response plans

example.name: acknowledgment-n: Args 0, 1 and modifiers
example.text: I have received no written acknowledgment from the company that they received either my email message or my written letter .

propbank.arg: that they received either my email message or my written letter

example.name: acknowledgment-n: Possessive pronoun as arg0
example.text: The first step in treatment is the patient 's acknowledgment that there is a problem .

example.name: acknowledgment-n: Arg 1 as "of" PP
example.text: There was no acknowledgment of the fact that he had cheated repeatedly on exams .

propbank.arg: of the fact that he had cheated repeatedly on exams

roleset.note: ACKNOWLEDGE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls consider-29.9-1, confess-37.10. Comparison with 'claim'. (from acknowledge.01-v)

ACKNOWLEDGMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry acknowledge.01, OntoNotes grouping acknowledgment-n senses 3,4, 6; maps to VN classes consider-29.9-1, confess-37.10. Framed by Claire. (from acknowledgment.01-n)
